title: Christine and Frank Lampard take baby Patricia for a walk 10 years after chance meeting
text:

Christine and Frank Lampard look every inch the doting parents as they enjoy a stroll with their adorable daughter Patricia.

The happy couple welcomed their first child 13 months ago and say she "completes" their family.

In a rare family outing, they were pictured walking around London with their little girl and their pet dog Minnie on Sunday morning.

Loose Women star Christine and Chelsea manager Frank treated themselves to take out coffees as they wrapped up in their winter coats for their walk.

Christine, 40, was dressed in black leggings and a black raincoat as she pushed Patricia along in her pram.

(Image: Colin Jack)

(Image: Colin Jack)

She let her brunette locks hang free in loose waves and went for a stunning natural look.

Frank, 41, wrapped up in joggers and a hoodie with a padded coat on top.

In one sweet snap, Frank was seen lending a helping hand as Christine lifted Patricia out of the car and put her little coat on.

(Image: Colin Jack)

(Image: Colin Jack)

Christina and Frank, who tied the knot in 2015, met 10 years ago at the Mirror's Pride of Britain Awards.

She became a doting stepmum to his daughters Luna, 14, and Isla, 12, and she says their family was "completed" when they welcomed Patricia last year.

Christine, who is a judge for this year's Pride of Britain, recently told the Mirror: "It was a complete Sliding Doors moment, I still remember the first meeting as clear as day. Who goes to an awards ceremony and finds a husband? That was me!

(Image: Colin Jack)

"Neither of us were even meant to go and I was late after hosting The One Show. So when we are there now we do have a celebratory glass of champagne. It’s a special evening for us."

Talking about Patricia, she added: "We were already really happy but I suppose it does complete things. I mean, goodness me, I still look at her now, a year old, and I honestly can’t quite believe she’s mine."
